/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of vehicles, including cars and buses, adding a dynamic element to the scene. Buildings of different sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sky, painted in hues of orange and pink, suggests that the photo was taken at sunset, adding a serene backdrop to the urban landscape.
